settings.name: PlanetSkyOverride
settings.message: This Setting should be disabled as Advanced Rocketry's Sky conflicts with Optifine's shaders.

settings.name: StationSkyOverride
settings.message: This Setting should be disabled as Advanced Rocketry's Sky conflicts with Optifine's shaders.

settings.name: PlanetSkyOverride
settings.message: This Setting should be disabled as Advanced Rocketry's Sky conflicts with Hyxcate/Nyx's Sky rendering.

settings.name: StationSkyOverride
settings.message: This Setting should be disabled as Advanced Rocketry's Sky conflicts with Hyxcate/Nyx's Sky rendering.

settings.name: WeakSkyRendersWhitelist
settings.message: This Setting should contain the dimension 0 (Overworld) as Astral Sorcery's Sky conflicts with Hyxcate's sky rendering.

settings.name: WeakSkyRendersWhitelist
settings.message: This Setting should contain the dimension 0 (Overworld) as Astral Sorcery's Sky conflicts with Optifine's shaders.

settings.name: shaders.enabled
settings.message: This setting messes up with Optifine's shaders, you should disable it if you use shaders.

settings.name: useShaders
settings.message: This setting messes up with Optifine's shaders, you should disable it if you use shaders.

settings.name: useCrystalShaders
settings.message: This setting messes up with Optifine's shaders, you should disable it if you use shaders.

settings.name: controllableJumpBoost
settings.message: This setting breaks dozens of jump height increasing effects. This setting should be false.

settings.name: fixReach
settings.message: This setting is incompatible with ReachFix and breaks several other reach increasing effects. This setting should be false.

settings.name: Update checker
settings.message: Update Checker may break in Cleanroom environment. This setting should be false.

settings.name: Alchemical Brass Requires Copper
settings.message: The `Alchemical Brass Requires Copper` tweak from ThaumicTweaker is a much better implementation of this. It is located in `ThaumicTweaker - Tweaks.cfg` → `general` → `miscellaneous tweaks`.

settings.name: Enable Caster Gauntlet
settings.message: The Clockwork Caster's Gauntlet from Congrega Mystica is a much better implementation of this. The tweaks are located in `congregamystica.cfg` → `general` → `caster gauntlets` → `clockwork caster's gauntlet`.

settings.name: Enable Caster Gauntlet
